problem.markdown:
1. The test piece is placed in such a way that the notch is facing
() Up () Towards the striking edge (x) Away from striking edge () Down
2. What kind of notch is used in the test piece in an Izod impact test?
() U-notch (x) V-notch () T-notch () No cut
3. Notches are used _____.
(x) All the above () To minimize plastic deformation () As a stress concentration region () Easy breakage
4. Which property of metals is essential for application such as gears and crankshaft which are subjected to impact loading?
() Ductility (x) Toughness () Hardness () Malleability
5. IS Code for Izod impact test is
() 1499-1977 () 5242-1979 () 3766-1977 (x) 1598-1977
